Uses of Class
laazotea.indi.client.INDIDevice

  • Packages that use INDIDevice 
    Package Description
    laazotea.indi.client
    Provides the classes necessary to create INDI Clients, connections to INDI Servers and to inspect and modify INDI properties of Devices.
    laazotea.indi.client.examples
    Some examples to test the INDI for Java Client library.

    • Uses of INDIDevice in laazotea.indi.client

      Methods in laazotea.indi.client that return INDIDevice 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      INDIDevice INDIProperty.getDevice()
      Gets the Device that owns this Property.
      INDIDevice INDIServerConnection.getDevice(java.lang.String name)
      Gets a particular Device by its name.
      INDIDevice INDIServerConnection.waitForDevice(java.lang.String name)
      This function waits until a Device with a name exists in this Connection and returns it.
      INDIDevice INDIServerConnection.waitForDevice(java.lang.String name, int maxWait)
      This function waits until a Device with a name exists in this Connection and returns it.
      Methods in laazotea.indi.client that return types with arguments of type INDIDevice 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<INDIDevice> INDIServerConnection.getDevicesAsList()
      Gets a List with all the Devices of this Connection.
      Methods in laazotea.indi.client with parameters of type INDIDevice 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void INDIDeviceListener.messageChanged(INDIDevice device)
      Called when the message for a Device has changed.
      void INDIServerConnectionListener.newDevice(INDIServerConnection connection, INDIDevice device)
      Called when a new Device is added to the Connection.
      void INDIDeviceListener.newProperty(INDIDevice device, INDIProperty property)
      Called when a new Property is added to the Device.
      void INDIServerConnectionListener.removeDevice(INDIServerConnection connection, INDIDevice device)
      Called when a device is removed from the Connection
      void INDIDeviceListener.removeProperty(INDIDevice device, INDIProperty property)
      Called when a Property is removed from a Device.
